content: 6 7 8 5 6 6 6 5 6 6 chain 1 *single_crochet 5 change color from round 5 if you work two- 6 6 6 7 8 half_double_crochet 5 double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 5 color hat 52 56 60 64 68 round 4 - 11 12 13 14 15 single_crochet 5 * repeat *-* around join 52 56 60 64 with beg chain 1 chain 2 double_crochet 68 around join with beg chain 2 cut yarn and fasten_off cathyren© you may not rewrite resell or trade this pattern no mass production allowed page 2 sew ears turn the tube inside out flatten it with last round s double_crochet sts on side and single_crochet sts in middle use yarn-sewing needle with contrast double_crochet sts double_crochet sts as the picture shows below color yarn to sew two guidelines for ears each ear no more than 1/3 position of width single_crochet sts wrong side right side use yarn-sewing needle to sew along the top edge to close the tube use main color yarn to sew a few sts along the guidelines and then take the guidelines away done wrong side turn the hat inside out right side cathyren© you may not rewrite resell or trade this pattern no mass production allowed page 3
